credentials.title: Bring Your Own Key
credentials.subtitle: Manage your upstream provider API keys and OAuth tokens
credentials.promo_title: üöÄ Zero routing fees for your own keys.
credentials.promo_desc: When our engine routes a request to your own API key, Keyaos takes $0.00. Unlike <OpenRouterLink>OpenRouter's 5% BYOK markup</OpenRouterLink>, self-matched routing is proudly 100% free forever. No toll booths, just raw upstream cost.
credentials.price_multiplier_helper: At {{ratio}}x multiplier, for every $1.00 of upstream API cost, requests will deduct ${{credited}} Credits.
credentials.hint_json_detected: JSON detected ‚Äî token will be auto-extracted
credentials.hint_access_token: This looks like a temporary access token (expires in ~1 hour). Please use the refresh token instead.
credentials.error_quota_required: This provider requires a manual quota value. Please enter the remaining balance.
credentials.error_secret_format: The key format doesn't match the expected pattern ({{example}}). Please double-check.
credentials.copy_prompt_tooltip: Click to copy a prompt you can paste into your AI IDE or CLI tool to extract the credential automatically.

copy_prompt_text.gemini-cli:
I need to extract my Gemini CLI refresh token from this machine.

1. Read the file: ~/.gemini/oauth_creds.json
2. Extract ONLY the "refresh_token" field value
3. Display the refresh_token value so I can copy it

Security: Do NOT display the full file contents or any "access_token" values ‚Äî only the refresh_token. The refresh_token typically starts with "1//".
copy_prompt_text.antigravity:
I need to extract my Antigravity IDE refresh token from this machine.

1. Find and read JSON files in: ~/.antigravity_tools/accounts/
2. Extract the nested "token.refresh_token" field value
3. Display the refresh_token value so I can copy it

Security: Do NOT display the full file contents or any access token values ‚Äî only the refresh_token. The refresh_token typically starts with "1//".
copy_prompt_text.kiro:
I need to extract my Kiro IDE refresh token from this machine.

1. Read the file: ~/.aws/sso/cache/kiro-auth-token.json
2. Extract ONLY the "refreshToken" field value (camelCase, NOT "accessToken")
3. Display the refreshToken value so I can copy it

Security: Do NOT display the full file contents or any "accessToken" values ‚Äî only the refreshToken. The refreshToken typically starts with "aor".

openrouter: Click "Create" to generate a new API key and copy it
zenmux: Click "Create API Key" and copy it
deepinfra: Click "New API Key" and copy it
deepseek: Create a new API key and copy it
google-ai-studio: Create a new API key and copy it
oaipro: Create a new API key and copy it
openai: Create a new secret key and copy it
qwen-code: Click "Ëé∑Âèñ Coding Plan API Key" to get the plan-exclusive API key and copy it
gemini-cli: Install Gemini CLI and run `gemini` to sign in with Google
Paste the file contents or just the refresh_token value
antigravity: Open Antigravity IDE and sign in with Google
Use the first command below to find your credential filename
Replace <filename> in the second command and run it
Paste the file contents or just the refresh_token value
kiro: Install Kiro IDE and sign in with GitHub or Google
Paste the file contents or just the refreshToken value

guide.title: Quick Start
guide.subtitle: Connect to Keyaos using any OpenAI-compatible client

cookie.message: We use cookies for analytics to improve your experience.

landing.hero_title: The AI Gateway That Routes Smarter
landing.hero_subtitle: One endpoint, every provider. Keyaos automatically finds the cheapest route for each request ‚Äî so you never overpay for AI.
landing.how_subtitle: Three steps to smarter AI spending
landing.step1_desc: Import API keys from any supported provider ‚Äî OpenRouter, DeepSeek, Google AI, OpenAI, and more.
landing.step2_desc: Our engine compares every provider in real time and picks the cheapest healthy key for each request.
landing.step3_desc: Drop-in compatible with OpenAI and Anthropic SDKs. Change one line ‚Äî the base URL ‚Äî and you're done.
landing.features_subtitle: Everything you need to manage, optimize, and scale your AI infrastructure.
landing.feat_routing_desc: Every request is dispatched to the lowest-cost provider. Health-aware failover handles the rest.
landing.feat_protocol_desc: Native OpenAI and Anthropic Messages API. Transparent protocol conversion under the hood.
landing.feat_marketplace_desc: Share idle API keys and earn credits when others route through them. Build a passive income stream.
landing.feat_streaming_desc: SSE responses flow from upstream to client with zero buffering. No gateway overhead.
landing.feat_opensource_desc: MIT licensed. Inspect every line, fork it, self-host it. No black boxes, no vendor lock-in.
landing.feat_edge_desc: Built on Cloudflare Workers + D1. Deploys globally with sub-millisecond cold starts.
landing.code_subtitle: Switch in seconds. Save from day one.
landing.cta_final_subtitle: Join the open network. Route smarter. Spend less.
